item.description:
Has anyone tried this new Japanese steakhouse/restaurant? It's in Vernon, CT, right near The Shoppes At 30 (in the old Bickford's). Any feedback would be appreciated!

Welcome to Top Fuji We are excited to be here in Vernon and to have the opportunity to enhance your dining pleasure!
All out chef have been trained and have worked in Japan, New York City, and San Fransisco's Finest restaurants. We only use fresh ingredients in all out dishes. Our vegetables seafood, and meats are shipped daily from New York City.

We sincerely hope our unique menu and friendly service will make for a magnificent evening for you and your family.
As Your hosts we are here to assist you and ensure your dinning experience at Top Fuji is unforgettable Your hosts Michael Zhu Billy Wong

Hibachi hold 20 people around the table meals are between 15.00 for Habachi chicken and 32.00 for Filet Mignon and Lobster per person.
item.why: You could have Tempura Banana and Ice cream. Why not!!!!!! and they do Karaoke

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Hibachi Dinner At TOP FUJI
